price: Y entonces dirá: ‘¡Oh, Señor mío! ¿Por qué me has resucitado ciego, si antes veía?’"
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ لِمَ حَشَرۡتَنِيٓ أَعۡمَىٰ وَقَدۡ كُنتُ بَصِيرٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi lima ḥashartanī aʿmā waqad kuntu baṣīran
